titles.title: For the relief of Eric Westhagen.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 4/6/2006--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to permit the continued occupancy and use of specified property by Eric Westhagen for the remainder of his natural life, subject to stated requirements.
